definition: erhua variant of 人情味[ren2 qing2 wei4]
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: We should show empathy when we deal with problems.
sentences.chinese: 我們處理問題也要有些人情味兒。

sentences.english: Give yourself permission to be human.
sentences.chinese: 允許自己富於“人情味兒”。

sentences.english: Don't say that I have no sentiment!
sentences.chinese: 不要說我沒有人情味兒。

sentences.english: These are the stories of the human side of Katrina.
sentences.chinese: 這是卡特里娜颶風中顯現出來的人情味兒的一面。
在這裏語言也顯得蒼白，不帶人情味兒。
